td.content: s:a 76 year old female with mild fever, mild cough and Respiratory. she has had several such episodes over past 3 years. she denies ever using cigarettes she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 60 in, Weight 137 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

td.content: s:pt presents with mild cough. pt also reports of mild fever. patient is a F retired aged 77 yrs. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol denies any smoking o:Height 61 in, Weight 143 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, nose = no nasal congestion, wheeze-LU, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, all lung fields a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed OMS - 50 DEMAND OXYGEN nasal cannula, and ordered FEV1, FEV1/FVC, Pulse Oximetry.
